tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WindTurbineMaintenance (
    turbine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    next_maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    turbine_id INT NOT NULL,
    update_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    update_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (turbine_id) REFERENCES turbines(turbine_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
   maintenance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   turbine_id UUID,
   maintenance_type STRING,
   maintenance_date DATE,
   maintenance_notes TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE WindTurbine ( turbine_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(255), last_maintenance_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule ( schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, turbine_id INT, maintenance_date DATE, technician VARCHAR(255) )
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog ( log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, schedule_id INT, maintenance_notes TEXT, completion_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE TurbineUpdates ( update_id INT PRIMARY KEY, turbine_id INT, update_date DATE, update_description TEXT )

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule { 
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    turbine_id INT, 
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255), 
    maintenance_date DATE, 
    technician_id INT 
}
